location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Map showing the Arabistan Telegraph Line

mods.abstract: The map, hand-drawn in black and red ink with water-coloured details, shows the destroyed Arabistan Telegraph Line, running between Bander Rig [Bandar Rig, Iran] and Borasjun [Borazjan, Iran], and a new proposed diversion of the route, between Bander Rig and Ahmedi [Ahmadi, Iran], continuing until Reshire [south of Bushehr].
